Articles.Content:
I don't know If this is the right forum or if it is even allowed but I am doing a KSP livestream today. it is 2 missions to duna(a lander and a space station).

Also there will be a landing on Ike to checkout and confirm a bug about it being dark.

( http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/32994-Ike-report )

The stream will be on http://www.twitch.tv/leax256

Come out and enjoy.

P.S. starts in about an hour

also i'm taking care of a baby bunny so there will be a break every hour so I can feed it.
I see you are brainwashing the young one as early as possible Would be fun if his first word would be: JEB!
thank you whoever moved this over. I know know where this forum sections is...actally I knewer knew it existed till like 30 sec ago.
